text: Esocidae is a family of fish in the order Esociformes, which contains pike, pickerel, and mudminnows. ==Studies== While the family only contained the genus Esox, recent studies have recovered Novumbra and Dallia as members of the family Esocidae, being closer related to Esox than Umbra. Fossil specimens from the Mesozoic in North America have been assigned as two additional genera in this family. Category:Esociformes
title: Esocidae
